md:
giải nghĩa từ "exhibition" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Exhibition (noun) - Triển lãm
	+ Meaning: A public show or display of works of art, products, or skills.
	+ Example sentence: The art exhibition at the museum featured works by local artists.
	+ Related words: display, show, presentation, showcase
	+ Antonyms: concealment, hiding

* Exhibition (noun) - Sự trình diễn
	+ Meaning: A performance or display of a particular skill or activity.
	+ Example sentence: The gymnast's exhibition of her skills impressed the judges.
	+ Related words: performance, display, demonstration, showcase
	+ Antonyms: concealment, hiding

* Exhibition (noun) - Triển lãm thương mại
	+ Meaning: A public show or display of goods or services for sale.
	+ Example sentence: The company participated in the exhibition to promote their new products.
	+ Related words: trade show, fair, market, display
	+ Antonyms: concealment, hiding

* Exhibition (adjective) - Triển lãm
	+ Meaning: Intended to be shown or displayed publicly.
	+ Example sentence: The exhibition pieces were carefully selected to showcase the artist's best work.
	+ Related words: display, show, public, showcase
	+ Antonyms: private, hidden
html:
giải nghĩa từ "exhibition" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

  • Exhibition (noun) - Triển lãm

    • Meaning: A public show or display of works of art, products, or skills.
    • Example sentence: The art exhibition at the museum featured works by local artists.
    • Related words: display, show, presentation, showcase
    • Antonyms: concealment, hiding

  • Exhibition (noun) - Sự trình diễn

    • Meaning: A performance or display of a particular skill or activity.
    • Example sentence: The gymnast's exhibition of her skills impressed the judges.
    • Related words: performance, display, demonstration, showcase
    • Antonyms: concealment, hiding

  • Exhibition (noun) - Triển lãm thương mại

    • Meaning: A public show or display of goods or services for sale.
    • Example sentence: The company participated in the exhibition to promote their new products.
    • Related words: trade show, fair, market, display
    • Antonyms: concealment, hiding

  • Exhibition (adjective) - Triển lãm

    • Meaning: Intended to be shown or displayed publicly.
    • Example sentence: The exhibition pieces were carefully selected to showcase the artist's best work.
    • Related words: display, show, public, showcase
    • Antonyms: private, hidden
